definitions.definition: Resembling or having the consistency of mush ; semiliquid , pasty , or granular .
examples: I don't especially like mushy oatmeal.
The brake pedal is mushy sometimes when I step on it.

definitions.definition: Overly sappy , corny , or cheesy ; maudlin .
examples: Skip the mushy , romantic scenes and get to the action.

main_definition: Resembling or having the consistency of mush ; semiliquid , pasty , or granular .
secondary_definitions: Overly sappy , corny , or cheesy ; maudlin .
